channel.title: Need help on my 525!
channel.description:
First i need help in 2 things i got a 508/525 server. Codeusa.
How do you make shops? using npc? i want a fully good guide as i never made shops on a 508/525
And second on quest tab spawning how do you make it cost to use that feature.
Like potions, how can i make it cost 100k to spawn?
